name: news-portal-backend

scripts.reset-db: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dbPath = path.join(__dirname, 'portal.db'); if (fs.existsSync(dbPath)) { fs.unlinkSync(dbPath); console.log('Database deleted. Run npm start to recreate.'); } else { console.log('No database file found.'); }"

description: Backend API for News Portal application
